data.actual_result: The days at the end of the previous month count down
data.expected_result: The days at the end of the previous month count up correctly
data.short_description: Dates in calendar in search go backwards at the end of the previous month (iPhone/iPod only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a random server/DM - Tap on search and tap before/after/during - Go to a month that started later in the week - Observe the days of the previous month in the calendar
